```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(RCzechia)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r, eval=F}

zeleznice() %>% mapview::mapview()
```

```{r, echo=F}
library(mapview)
wgt <- mapview::mapview(zeleznice())
mapshot(wgt@map, file = "maptest.png", remove_controls = NULL)
```


```{r, echo=F}
knitr::include_graphics("maptest.png")
```
